trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Brownwood
There were no other sightings in Brownwood on or around November 14th 2008
Object Shape: Boomerang, Circle, Disc, Fireball, Flash, Teardrop, Other, Unknown
Summary: I saw 7 different sightings that night, my wife and son, an my sister saw 4 of the 7 that I saw on 11/14/2008 it was about 7:45 PM, I was on the front pouch talking on the telephone with my sister she was looking out her kitchen window facing south.
divs: sighting detailsit was about 7:45 pm.11\14\2008 i was talking to my sister on my front pouch on the telephone .she was looking south out her kitchen window.i live about 300 feet just south of her .i was looking at were a feed mill and seed company is located .about one mile south\south east of my home .then there it was in the sky about 100 feet of the ground flashing fire balls shooting up ward in the sky .i started yelling out at my sister ,did you see that ,did you see that .the second flash of fire balls were four fire balls and they were plus ading and started to take shape to it in a circle form . it was moving up ward at 45 degree slow ,and by that time my wife and son was running out side to see what i was yelling about then the third time like the frist two times ,it just apeared agian 4 fire balls and they were turned at a ankle this time ,were you could see more of its shape .it was disc shape with 4 fire balls ,in a line with each other it went out again then apeared agian by this time my wife and son were out side to see the fourth sighting with me and my sister saw all four sightings with me .the four time it apeared ,4 fire balls,shape was disc but it was at a ankle still moving up ward at a 45 degree ankle .then it went out .this all happen in about a 30 to 45 second span of time .we all was so trilled at what we saw .my wife and i, sons waited about 10 min's looking for more of what we just saw .and we decided to go up to the feed company to see if there was anything on the road and to see if there was a fire or something there .there was nothing there .we were coming back to the house and then the 5 th sighting my wife saw it frist .then myself and son saw it .it was two lights one above the other about 500 feet apart no shape yet just lights and they were moving slow in the sky just north of our home .what ever this one was it was not like the frist 4 things we saw .it was boomerang shape with two white lights on what look like on each wing .it was moving very slow for about 3 min's when we got close to home it started moving faster then just went out of sight very fast .we got home and started talking about what we just saw .we sat out on the front pouch for about two more hours that night it was about an hour after the frist sighting and just south of our home there were two fire lines ,yes i said two fire lines ,one beside the other ,they just apeared for about 3 seconds and went out .after that sighting about 45 min's later about 6 miles east of our home there was one more .it was like falling out of the sky a white light or white fire ball ,it fell for about 3 seconds an then just went out .we were so shoked at what we saw that night and were kind of shy about telling any one the next day .we just ask the people , we came in contact with if they had saw anything last night . my sister saw one more sighting late in the night about 2;30 am it was two white light just south of our hpme ,they were kind of chancing each other moving side ways and at all ankles like they were playing chance with each other .i did report this the next day to a friend at mufon, steve at csallen57 .
Object Flight Path: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
